keys: se lever de niveau de la mer

          <title>
            <string language="en">Effects of increasing carbon dioxide level in the atmosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekte der Erhöhung der Kohlendioxydstufe in der
Atmosphäre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effets d'augmenter le niveau d'anhydride 
carbonique dans l'atmosphère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeitos de aumentar o nível do dióxido de 
carbono na atmosfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetti di aumento del livello dell'anidride 
carbonica nell'atmosfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτελέσματα του αυξανόμενου επιπέδου διοξειδίου του 
άνθρακα στην ατμόσφαιρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efectos de aumentar el nivel del bióxido de 
carbono en la atmósfera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the possible outcomes when the temperature on the earth's surface rises due to the greenhouse effect.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">global warming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">greenhouse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice caps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea level rising</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trapped heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die möglichen Resultate 
wenn die Temperatur auf den Anstiegen Oberfläche der Masse wegen des 
Gewächshauseffektes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les résultats possibles
quand la température sur les élévations de la surface de la terre 
dues à l'effet de serre chaude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostrar os resultados possíveis
quando a temperatura nas ascensões da superfície da terra  devido ao
efeito da estufa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i risultati possibili 
quando la temperatura sugli aumenti della superficie della terra 
dovuto l'effetto della serra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πιθανές εκβάσεις πότε η 
θερμοκρασία στη γήινη επιφάνεια ανέρχεται λόγω στο φαινόμενο του
θερμοκηπίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los resultados posibles 
cuando la temperatura en las subidas de la superficie de la tierra  
debido al efecto del invernadero.</string>
          </description>
